meanings.definition: The act of making something more sensual or appealing to the senses.
meanings.sent1: The sensualization of the room with scented candles created a relaxing atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The sensualization of the dessert menu with rich chocolate cakes enticed customers.
meanings.sent3: The sensualization of the garden with colorful flowers made the bees happy.
meanings.sent4: The sensualization of the music transformed the ordinary party into a magical experience.
meanings.sent5: The sensualization of the painting brought out the vibrant colors and textures beautifully.

meanings.definition: The process of enhancing the sensory experience of something.
meanings.sent1: The sensualization of the massage oils added a luxurious touch to the spa treatment.
meanings.sent2: The sensualization of the movie soundtrack intensified the emotional impact of the scenes.
meanings.sent3: The sensualization of the picnic basket with delicious treats delighted everyone.
meanings.sent4: The sensualization of the sunset painted the sky in breathtaking hues.
meanings.sent5: The sensualization of the fabric enhanced the softness and comfort of the clothing.

meanings.definition: The act of adding sensual elements to something.
meanings.sent1: The sensualization of the advertisement with romantic imagery captured viewers' attention.
meanings.sent2: The sensualization of the cocktail menu with exotic flavors intrigued the guests.
meanings.sent3: The sensualization of the office space with scented candles sparked creativity among employees.
meanings.sent4: The sensualization of the dance routine with graceful movements mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The sensualization of the room decor with velvet drapes added a touch of elegance to the ambiance.
